div.h1: We Build Great Systems at a Great Price
div.p: At American Surplus, we're proud to have spent over 27 years helping businesses save money while designing their warehouse logistics systems. It all starts in our facility, where our expert conveyor technicians prepare every order with care before leaving our building. When purchasing a used gravity conveyor system, it's important to make sure the product you're buying is in good condition and ready to offer years of reliable service. That's why we cut out the guesswork! Our conveyor technicians ensure every system leaving our facility is ready for a long, productive service life, leaving you with nothing but peace of mind (and a happy wallet!)
Whatever your application, we have all the used 30" conveyor accessories that you'll need to setup an efficient, safe, and secure system while saving you money!
Cross your lines safely and easily without halting production with used conveyor walkovers!

Create a convenient walkway through your conveyor line!
Manual and powered conveyor gates available!

Need to handle merge/diverge applications on your line? We have used conveyor spurs for that! They're perfect for transferring product to or from a main conveyor line, to or from workstations, or similar applications.
Need to protect your product from falling off the side of your line? Look no further than used conveyor guard rails!

div.p: Automotion has become an icon name in the conveyor industry. Being around for more than 50 years you can count on Automotion products to not only complete your task but withstand the wear and tear of time. They have a great track record and are always looking for new ways to innovate the conveyor industry by improving on the great products already on the market.

Acquired in 2009 by Intelligrated, the Buschman Company offered industry-leading solutions throughout the 1900s for many stages of product distribution for a diverse set of industries from retail mass distribution centers to pharmacheutical supply chains. Their pre-engineered, Made-in-America gravity conveyor systems have stood the test of time and are prepared to provide you many years of dedicated service!

With over 60 years of industry experience, Hytrol is one of the most recognizable names in conveyors and conveying accessories. Designed with sustainability, durability, and ease of use in mind, Every Hytrol gravity conveyor system delivers results and reliability where it matters most in your facility.

Known throughout the second half of the 20th century as a leader in developing innovative supply chain solutions, Rapistan's name lives on through their reliable gravity conveyor systems, which continue to be used in facilities across America to this day. If one thing's for certain, you can trust a used Rapistain gravity roller conveyor system!

Versa has earned their way into the industry over the last 25 years! They focus on engineering and integration to help ensure the most effective and efficient production teams. When productivity is on the line you can count on Versa's products to ensure the job gets done right!
